DOC.brief_summary: In double blind randomize study evaluate effect Zinc sulfate prevention mucositis due high dose chemotherapy patient undergo bone marrow transplantation whose receive Busulfan and/or Cyclophosphamide . Patients randomize two group : intervention control balance block randomization method . Intervention group receive Zinc sulfate immediately start condition regimen continue two week . Control group receive placebo manner . Prevalence severity mucositis compare two group .
